response.overview: At the end of 2022, the Wizzy Gang ventures to Southeast Asia to shoot a Parkour and adventure film across Vietnam, Cambodia and Thailand. Join the adventure of 9 buddies who travel halfway around the world for several months to pursue their childhood dream. The Wizzy Gang is a French parkour and cliff diving team known for their Youtube videos. On this journey, the group will encounter a multitude of problems that stand in the way of their way of life. Follow them through 3 different civilizations that have built our society and forced this group to see the world differently. With this film, they want to show a new facet of their adventures; through civilizations where the Wizzy way of life is essential: using one's environment to live life to the full. This project was entirely planned, directed and produced by Wizzy Gang.
response.title: Civilisation
